I wore this a couple of times after purchasing a sample from Le Labos website. I love a unisex fragrance and most of the perfumes I own are unisex, however, this was just too cologne-esque and male suited for me. Also, I never smelled any lavender? Not when first sprayed, not after being on my skin and clothes for a couple of hours, and not even at the end of the day after wearing for 10+ hours. A flop.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2246671"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2246671#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2238668" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2238668" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Moe2021"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2152987"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Moe2021" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Houbigant/Bois-Mystique-50100.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50100.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois Mystique"title="Bois Mystique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2238668ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2238668" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2152987">Moe2021</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-04">08/04/24 10:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Went to Nordstrom and tried the house of Le Labo for first time and i was impressed! Ended up getting the discovery set which Lavande 13 is part of it<br />
Such a beautiful scent love the musky animalistic dry down definitely worth a try</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2238668"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2238668#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2235899" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2235899" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BKNYRockstar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2209975"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BKNYRockstar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2235899ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2235899" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2209975">BKNYRockstar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-01">08/01/24 12:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Rating: <br />
<br />
I had high hopes for Lavande 31, given its premium price and sophisticated branding, but it fell flat on all fronts.  I was hoping for a fresh, modern take on lavender, but I was sorely disappointed. Unfortunately, this fragrance smells overwhelmingly like an old lady's perfume. The scent is incredibly dated, lacking any of the contemporary nuances I was expecting.<br />
<br />
From the moment I sprayed it, I was hit with a musty aroma that lingered far too long. Instead of the clean scent I anticipated, it felt like I had stepped into a time capsule of perfume choices from decades ago. It's anything but luxurious.<br />
<br />
If you're looking for a fresh, modern lavender scent, this is definitely not it. Save your money and look elsewhere unless you're specifically seeking a perfume that smells like an old lady.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2235899"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2235899#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2231239" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2231239" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maxmiller614"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2192051"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2192051.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maxmiller614" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2231239ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2231239" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2192051">Maxmiller614</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-27">07/27/24 14:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There are so many differing reviews here but to me, this is excellent! When I smelled it in store, I had to get a sample.<br />
<br />
I wore the sample for multiple days and I loved the sillage, even people around me were asking what it was. The lavender is clear, and there is a crisp citrus feeling to it as well that is great. The dry down is a beautiful bit of lavender and dryness that feels very fougere like. Feels masculine to me and reminds me a lot of Tom Fords beau du jour but better in my opinion (even though Beau Du Jour lasts longer)<br />
<br />
Eventually I decided I had to have this and bought a 50ML.<br />
<br />
I get about 4 hours of longevity here which I wish was better, but Im stoked to rock this for the rest of summer, fall, and in the office.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2231239"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2231239#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2228305" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2228305" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dave.smart9"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2198583"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2198583.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dave.smart9" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2228305ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2228305" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2198583">dave.smart9</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-24">07/24/24 14:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Grandma did the laundry, but she swapped her usual detergent for an upmarket one that's infused with nostalgia. Now the laundry has been in her wooden dresser for a few days.<br />
Sophisticated and unassuming at the same time. Not enough of a feature to warrant asking what it is, but enough of one to leave you inwardly wondering  without daring to ask about such a surely meaningless, inconsequential piece of information.<br />
It slides into its dry down much fresher and less settled than you would expect. Perhaps there's a secret edge to grandma after all. Good for her, but I may remain a quasi-admirer rather than a wearer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2228305"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2228305#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222319" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2222319" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mez0Nez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1205933"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mez0Nez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2222319ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2222319" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1205933">Mez0Nez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 09:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nothing really special. Strong Musk, Lavender, Tonka bean with neroli touch. Strong musk is not fancy or sophisticated. just cheap musk only cares about strength like any detergent is. <br />
When I met with many perfumers from fragrance companies, they said about detergents: "The most important thing about products of this category, is powerful, persistent lingering (leftover) scent". That means that cheap musks and ambers even can be used for laundry detergents can create this scent.<br />
so, I cannot find any reason why this is an expensive perfume from its compositions, and if it consists of expensive ingredients, I'm very suspicious of the perfumer's ability.<br />
Musk Memento by Jo Malone can be the substutite for this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2222319"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2222319#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220842" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2220842" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="montee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1221166"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1221166.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="montee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chinatown-1300.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1300.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chinatown"title="Chinatown"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2220842ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2220842" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1221166">montee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-16">07/16/24 21:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Neroli, bergamot, lavender. Highly common and apparent notes of 3, all harmonious and made soapy. Just by looking at the accords you can already tell this smells like a bar of soap.<br />
<br />
Yep bar of soap. You will NOT like this if you dislike soapy fragrances.<br />
<br />
One of the less polarizing Le Labos and smells very classic! This is a well known assimilation of notes and has worked for many generations. People say it smells cheap or generic here, possibly generic but CERTAINLY not cheap.<br />
<br />
This smells both distinctly French and Italian, the lavender is like a French lavender (less sweet and more herbaceous) and the Neroli/Bergamot makes it smell Italian (sparkly and clean).<br />
<br />
Its smells like a soap imo but pleasant and projects/lasts better than most fragrances in its class. Leans feminine yet Unisex, I mean its an inoffensive smell anyone can pull it off! Is it worth the money though... NO. <br />
<br />
A BIG DOWNSIDE is that this isnt very stable, at times this could smell too dewy or too punchy.. something tells me this wont smell the same on everyones skin <br />
<br />
Suitable for almost everyone, everywhere, daytime, all seasons. 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2220842"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2220842#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2217979" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2217979" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cheonzae"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1438186"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1438186.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cheonzae" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2217979ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2217979" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1438186">cheonzae</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-13">07/13/24 21:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Why does this perfume make my skin smell bad? like the stench of urine...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2217979"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2217979#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2213371" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2213371" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ButterGoose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1917307"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ButterGoose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2213371ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2213371" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1917307">ButterGoose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-09">07/09/24 15:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After reading the reviews on this fragrance, Ive noticed most people compare the scent to fresheners/cleaners and voice their disappointment. My experience however, couldnt be further from this. I am constantly asked what I am wearing whenever I wear this fragrance- some even used the words heavenly and divine to describe how wonderful I smell, and I have been stopped in the street or at work several times. Projection is moderate, but not modest, and I would say longevity is 4-6 hours with a spray at pulse points. Im not going to pretend to know about notes and dry down etc, but the general vibe is clean, expensive and seductive- dont ask me how. Its worth noting that I tried so hard to wear Le Labos Santal 33 without achieving its desired projection of cool- a colleague of mine told me it was strong and odd. I think like a lot of higher-end fragrances, Le Labo really depends on your skins chemical reaction to really make it work. This is now my go-to scent and I cringe at how I wore santal 33 for so long despite it clearly not suiting me. Lavande 31 has given me what I was missing from Santal 33.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2213371"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2213371#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2196975" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2196975" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Endlessfumes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1380940"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1380940.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Endlessfumes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-430.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.430.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male"title="Le Male"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2196975ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2196975" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1380940">Endlessfumes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-23">06/23/24 05:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Le labos's take on blue fragrances, a hybrid of ysl myslf and sauavage.<br />
Nothing unique here.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2196975"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2196975#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2192600" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2192600" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Arieeane"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1882682"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1882682.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Arieeane" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Merchant-of-Venice/Queen-of-The-Night-83803.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83803.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Queen of The Night"title="Queen of The Night"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2192600ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2192600" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1882682">Arieeane</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-18">06/18/24 20:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just dont get this perfume. I love it, I hate it one day its amazing the next its overbearing. Le labos are just confusing to me. They dont perform, theyre special but they dont project so then you have to overspray and if you overspray then its a small scent bubble thats only for you to choke on. Gosh I dont know what to do but le labo fragrances and I might not be a match. <br />
<br />
Same experience with Jasmin 17, I sold it. Might sell my lavande unless I like how it wears over a molecule.<br />
<br />
I decided to keep and wear over lotion .. it works better this way. Ultimately I love the scent and love the le Labo dna with this profile but it hurts to admit lol<br />
<br />
I do get compliments wearing this fragrance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2192600"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2192600#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2188298" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2188298" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="angienkj"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1880002"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1880002.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="angienkj" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Cedrat-37-Berlin-68788.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68788.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cedrat 37 Berlin"title="Cedrat 37 Berlin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2188298ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2188298" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1880002">angienkj</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-14">06/14/24 13:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like my 10 lavender soap, $1 lavender room spray, $2 lavender floor cleaner, and my $1 toilet bowl cleaner. The only difference is the price. When I was wearing this, my husband thought I sprayed myself with our room spray; he was in total shock. Then I told him, "I am wearing Le Labo perfume." He was in even greater shock.<br />
The scent is good but smells cheap and artificial; it is not worth the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2188298"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2188298#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2179984" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2179984" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="asiarakk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1305265"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1305265.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="asiarakk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2179984ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2179984" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1305265">asiarakk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-06">06/06/24 09:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great perfume, lavander start. Musky floral drydown with a little hint of lavander somewhere in the background. On a masculine side, would be great for 30+ yo male or more masculine lesbian woman. <br />
<br />
1.5h later its creamy musk on my skin,I dont like it. Reminds me of another 13 drydown that both are super unpleasant to my nose. Most people around me (public place) wasnt happy about the smell haha. Longevity is meh, staying only 2-3h on my skin. Half of it is just sweet boring musk.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2179984"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2179984#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2176381" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2176381" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AndySmellsGreat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1141379"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1141379.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AndySmellsGreat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Apex-72723.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72723.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Apex"title="Apex"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2176381ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2176381" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1141379">AndySmellsGreat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-03">06/03/24 04:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The only votes here that make sense are the overpriced and unisex. Everything else is misrepresented.<br />
<br />
Im a Lavender fan and somewhat appreciative of Le Labo. <br />
<br />
Whilst I like this perfume its muskiness makes this. Fairly ordinary laundry scent. Soft in its disposition its nothing like the in your face offers from Hermetica, Tom Ford and even Calvin Klein. <br />
<br />
I think for the price they can do a lot better than this - its a tad insulting. Bergamotto on the other hand</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2176381"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2176381#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2175096" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2175096" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dudebro"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1392247"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1392247.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dudebro" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84249.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lavande 31"title="Lavande 31"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2175096ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2175096" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1392247">dudebro</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-01">06/01/24 19:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>a sudden favorite from Le Labo.<br />
<br />
relaxing lavender gently oscillating between soapy neroli and clean laundry musk before settling to a signature Le Labo base hours later.<br />
<br />
edit: there's something ever so slightly animalic far into the dry down. I guess it's just the musk and amber, but it's a surprising depth to an otherwise relaxing and fluffy fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2175096"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2175096#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2172480" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2172480" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ciara86"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2149389"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2149389.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ciara86" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Intense-Oud-32743.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32743.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Intense Oud"title="Intense Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2172480ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2172480" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2149389">Ciara86</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-30">05/30/24 10:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens with a strong citrus note which smells a bit like toilet cleaner before drying down to a lovely soft lavender scent however not brash and overpowering like a lot of lavender heavy fragrances. Let it settle more and youll get a really sharp, soapy note which is so comforting. Love love love this!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2172480"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2172480#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2151426" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2151426" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bradley B."/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2126156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bradley B." style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Colonia-Intensa-1684.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1684.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Colonia Intensa"title="Colonia Intensa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2151426ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2151426" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2126156">Bradley B.</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-10">05/10/24 04:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a scent that can be used up rather quickly when in the mood. It wakes you up with a bright juicy sensation, but is not as light as other citrus scents. It stays with you throughout the day. There is a chalkiness to it as well. Its quite unlike any other citrus fragrance that I have. An enjoyable one when looking to lift the mood.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2151426"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2151426#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2130256" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2130256" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Magicalworldofhannah"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1919948"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1919948.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Magicalworldofhannah" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2130256ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2130256" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1919948">Magicalworldofhannah</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-20">04/20/24 03:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I first smelt this I got chills. It is BEAUTIFUL! I wouldn't have known it was lavender dominant if it was just based off scent because the lavender is not a photorealistic lavender or strong at all. It's incredibly subtle and modern. NOTHING like what you're thinking when you think "lavender". It's a perfect winter scent, modern, feminine, powdery, creamy, whispers of modern lavender (although, if I were to truly describe this I'd say powdery and white florals but not grandma vibes). It's also very unique... I haven't smelt anything like this, it's definitely worth a smell if you're into either powdery or white florals or creamy scents. It isn't gourmand, rather a floral. 10/10 in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2130256"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2130256#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2125432" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2125432" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zex89"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250514"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1250514.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="zex89" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2125432ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2125432" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250514">zex89</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-15">04/15/24 09:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I mean,.. its an ok run of the mill "masculine" neroli-lavander smell.<br />
But paying 210 euro to smell like a random toilet freshner,.. meh. <br />
I have no issue wearing it but i'd never pay money for this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2125432"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2125432#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2107200" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2107200" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="felipebizarria.1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1061541"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1061541.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="felipebizarria.1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68960.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spell On You"title="Spell On You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2107200ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2107200" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1061541">felipebizarria.1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-28">03/28/24 14:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Le Labo claims to be a Grasse-New York perfume label, here you will find the Grasse side of the company. Lavande 31 opens with a beautiful neroli note! A white bar soap that will stay with you even after the shower is over. Longevity is a huge point in here, once citric fragrances tend to evaporate in a matter of minutes. <br />
Notes: Neroli, Aldehydes, some Provencal lavender, white musks, the same molecule from Another 13 and the amber base. But Neroli is the great star of this composition and it takes you to a French vibe/voyage. Finally or 6 hours later, the dry down takes you back to New York but you'll never forget the Grasse journey in it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2107200"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2107200#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2103436" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2103436" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Magicalworldofhannah"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1919948"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1919948.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Magicalworldofhannah" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2103436ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2103436" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1919948">Magicalworldofhannah</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-25">03/25/24 05:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had full body chills upon smelling this! Wow! It's my latest obsession and I'm annoyed I didn't smell it sooner! This is such a nostalgic scent for me as it reminds me of a sandalwood perfume oil I had as a teenager. For me, it's neroli and sandalwood heavy in the opening but not in a woody or heavy way / in a light aromatherapy way,  and it dries down to a powdery soapy lavender whilst still projecting this warm sandalwood mysterious scent. I can't describe it because for me this scent is otherworldly! I adore it, it lasts ages and I can smell it on my clothes the next day, the scent throw isn't bad either - I simply adore it! Don't expect a heavy lavender, to be honest it's only occasional whispers of lavender I get in the dry down like lavender soap almost (which doesn't sound good but I assure you it is!) and mostly sandalwood in a very gentle soothing way, nothing woody or spicy about it. I give this a 10/10 and highly recommend trying it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2103436"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2103436#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2100328" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2100328" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wowoweee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1700301"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1700301.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="wowoweee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2100328ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2100328" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1700301">wowoweee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-22">03/22/24 01:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like hot laundry + Ambroxen. Extremely bland and when you factor in the price its nearly farcical</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2100328"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2100328#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2092887" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2092887" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NoClock"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1497206"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1497206.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NoClock" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Acne-Studios-91209.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91209.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acne Studios"title="Acne Studios"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2092887ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2092887" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1497206">NoClock</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-14">03/14/24 20:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bleached lavender.  <br />
<br />
Opening - cold minerals and washing powder (metalic lavender and neroli)<br />
Mid - private indoor swimming pool (mineral notes, medicinal dried lavender, ambroxan)<br />
Base- fluffy bleached towels (tonka, amber, flashes of leftover washing powder)<br />
<br />
 Starts cold ends warm, clean throughout.  Key word clean.  Not very traditional in style, the tonka comes across like a wink to more traditional lavenders, but just a wink.  More a scent than a perfume.  Not for everyone, but unlikely to offend those around you.  <br />
<br />
Good longevity for a fresh lavender.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2092887"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2092887#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2092041" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2071693" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="daisy366"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1894781"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1894781.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="daisy366" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2071693ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2071693" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); It isnt an unbearable soapy smell, however. My friend thought it smelled clean and put together. I probably wouldnt mind smelling it on someone as they pass by, but I would not want to smell it for an extended period of time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; They all have a similar sharpness and together become too much, like lavender scented dishwashing detergent. <br />
Very astringent.<br />
<br />
VERDICT: Lavande in love is a MUCH better option for less than half the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2064783"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2064783#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2058164" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2058164" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Endlessfumes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1380940"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1380940.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Endlessfumes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-430.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.430.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male"title="Le Male"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2058164ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2058164" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1380940">Endlessfumes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-10">02/10/24 10:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ambroxan is not listed as a note and is prominent at drydown.<br />
Very molecular scent. Nothing special here but quality is on point.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2058164"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2058164#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2054509" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2054509" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stefavramoglou"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1620073"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="stefavramoglou" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2054509ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2054509" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1620073">stefavramoglou</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-07">02/07/24 00:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is a very pleasant, neroli-bergamot forward fragrance and one of the few freshies that last for long on my skin. The lavender here unfolds slowly and is indeed not the classic lavender scent that we are used to, while in the end everything is anchored with the classic Le Labo musky / ambery base.<br />
<br />
It literally lasts all day, projecting moderately. <br />
<br />
Reviewers should be a bit more unbiased and not just slander anything new that gets released in this market.<br />
<br />
If you find that citrusy and fresh fragrances do not last long on you, give this one a try. It's great and I've been given compliments on this on more than one occassion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2054509"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2054509#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2052227" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2052227" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zig von Katz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2001841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2001841.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zig von Katz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2052227ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2052227" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2001841">Zig von Katz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-04">02/04/24 15:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I used to clean hotel rooms for a living when I was in my 20s, and this very much takes me back to that. An opening of floor cleaner with a musky base note. I strongly dislike this because of the association with low wages for back-breaking work.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2052227"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2052227#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2050786" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2050786" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scentsitivewoman05"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1988968"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1988968.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scentsitivewoman05" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Love-Don-t-Be-Shy-4322.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4322.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love Don't Be Shy"title="Love Don't Be Shy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2050786ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2050786" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1988968">Scentsitivewoman05</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-03">02/03/24 06:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a guilty pleasure. Picture thr old money from greece who has beige and monochrome aesthetic with slick bun or slick pompadour haor cut for man. The opening is neroli and lavender, nothing synthetic, very seamless blended, very soft like a luxurious soap and lotion which lingers intensely on the skin. Very soapy clean perfume. Unfortunately the projection range is limited, intimate. Though it is intimate, it stays moderately around 6 hours on the skin and a bit longer on clothes. For the poor projection it is kind of overprice but what can I say, I like classy clean scent as if your own skin radiate pleasant odor.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
