padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1644242">mae.si</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-19">10/19/23 11:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wanted to love this, but unfortunately its not what I hoped it would be. In my opinion, Le Labo is usually really good at making their fragrances smell deep and natural, but this is a screechy, synthetic and detergent-like lavender to my nose.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="1956091"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=1956091#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1954455" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1954455" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ambermusk1996"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1565924"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1565924.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ambermusk1996" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Poivre-23-London-6339.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6339.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Poivre 23 London"title="Poivre 23 London"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1954455ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1954455" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1565924">ambermusk1996</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-17">10/17/23 15:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After reading other reviews, I was hoping to really enjoy this perfume, but in my opinion it still has a very medicinal/cleaner lavender smell. I also think that it leans quite masculine, as it wore through the day the floral note faded and was left with a sharp bergamot/musk. I do think that I would enjoy this fragrance on a man, but Im not sure Id say its worth the Le Labo price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="1954455"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=1954455#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1953247" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1953247" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="s.may_h"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1523286"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1523286.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="s.may_h" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Feminin-Pluriel-26253.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.26253.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Feminin Pluriel"title="Feminin Pluriel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1953247ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1953247" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1523286">s.may_h</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-16">10/16/23 09:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean lavender and cirtus scent with a hint of sweetness! reminds me of a day at the spa but overall a very comforting scent. longivity 8/10, projection 8/10. unisex fragrance, smells amazing!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="1953247"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=1953247#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1952334" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1952334" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ilikewhatilike"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516720"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1516720.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ilikewhatilike" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1952334ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1952334" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516720">Ilikewhatilike</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-15">10/15/23 06:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think this is nice and Le Labo achieved what it set out to do by shedding its nostalgic connotations (of lavender) as this does feel modern. <br />
<br />
Citrus beginning is nice and the lavender and Le Labo  musk mid is nice. Tonka isnt too powerful but it all combines to be a nice, easy to wear and comfortable scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="1952334"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=1952334#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1951713" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251529">hunter.strawberry</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-14">10/14/23 09:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lavande 31 <br />
<br />
What opens up with bright, sparkling bergamot and lavender, unfortunately dries down to a citrusy, fougre bathroom refresher. Good longevity though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="1951713"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=1951713#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1951301" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Ordering a full size! Its the most relaxing lavender scent. The Tonka really shows up on my skin as well. The perfect lounging + bedtime scent. 100% full bottle worthy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="1951301"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=1951301#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1950962" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1950962" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Charmedbymeghan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1736880"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Charmedbymeghan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1950962ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1950962" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1736880">Charmedbymeghan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-13">10/13/23 10:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A clean yet sweet Lavender/Tonka is what I get.   It's absolutely beautiful and my favorite among Le Labo's line (I haven't tried the city exclusives though*)...  it smells like a modern Lavender  and not just your typical aromatic essential oil type of note that has been in a lot of Lavender perfumes of the past.  The neroli &amp; tonka are really rounding Lavender's edges and making it an easy-wear anywhere type of perfume.  This could be a signature scent, and worn by anyone, whatever sex or age.  It is lovely and comforting, clean and relaxed but also put together...  Reminds me a lot of Lush's Lavender/Vanilla fragrance (I forget the name) but Le Labo's is obviously more well-composed and smells higher quality (even though I also love Lush's too)...  <br />
<br />
This is a masterpiece to me.   <br />
10/10<br />
I will be buying the full-size bottle soon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="1950962"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=1950962#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1950520" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1005326">Nessers</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-12">10/12/23 20:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Le Labo is a great brand in my opinion. That's because the chemistry works perfectly on my skin. I wanted to mention that because how this particular fragrance smells to you is in direct response to how the chemistry works on your skin. I sprayed this for the first time tonight and it smells fantastic. In fact it smells so good my mother actually complimented and wants her own bottle. Something she never says. I have over 200 fragrances and 300 samples. Just to give you an idea on how picky she is. It's sweet fresh and aromatic. Very safe and very approachable. There's not much else to say here but sometimes that's a good thing. The crystal collector. The Reiki master. The plant Parent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="1950520"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=1950520#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1950407" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1950407" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Troyd247Mall"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1826115"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Troyd247Mall" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1950407ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1950407" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1826115">Troyd247Mall</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-12">10/12/23 17:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Here are my preliminary thoughts on the new Le Labo Lavande<br />
<br />
<br />
Again, Le Labo goes with the musk here clean, laundry, soapy scents (literally detergent smell which might be a negative to some)<br />
<br />
The intro has a prominent Neroli with blended in and lingering citrus for the initial wake up <br />
<br />
Then it goes into the clean, slightly soapy warming lavender/musk combo<br />
<br />
Because this uses likeable notes like neroli and lavender I foresee this being a mainstream hit across the community. I have no hate on the brand so I liked the initial sensation<br />
<br />
This is super safe, unisex, versatile, work and play. Might smell familiar or redundant so please sample first.<br />
<br />
Full review soon on YT @TroyD247Mall</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="1950407"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=1950407#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1949828" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1948343" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gustel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1860938"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1860938.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gustel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1948343ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1948343" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1860938">Gustel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-10">10/10/23 05:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Starts very citric but dries down very, very quickly to a fresh. clean. lavender. <br />
<br />
With Le Labo, definetly try it on your skin first before purchasing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="1948343"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=1948343#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1947770" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1947770" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="clspacke"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1801998"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1801998.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="clspacke" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-Profumo-Di-Fiori-62281.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62281.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci Bloom Profumo Di Fiori"title="Gucci Bloom Profumo Di Fiori"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1947770ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1947770" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1801998">clspacke</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-09">10/09/23 08:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Picked this up a few days ago and so far here are my thoughts<br />
<br />
Not much difference for me between initial spray and dry down, which isnt usually what I find with Le Labo. The lavender is actually very present for me, and is rather sweet. My husband immediately said it smelled like soap, and hes right, this is a very soapy clean fragrance. I think its rather masculine for a lavender based fragrance, which I dont usually like, but I like it here. I wore it yesterday solo for the morning and then with Vanille 44 over it in the afternoon and I can still smell the Lavende on my jacket from yesterday. It is probably my longest lasting Le Labo, also a surprise. For me this hits as a winter and spring daytime fragrance if your wearing it solo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="1947770"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=1947770#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1947758" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1947758" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Keemun"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1313301"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1313301.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Keemun" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Cartier/Declaration-Essence-1121.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1121.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Declaration Essence"title="Declaration Essence"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1947758ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1947758" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1313301">Keemun</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-09">10/09/23 08:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As a long-time hater of this brand, I will concede this one is good.  It is very neroli-forward, but in a soapy way.  The citrus is only there for the first 5 minutes before the lavender comes through and it goes soft and musky.  That said, the price is high, and I do own quite a few neroli and lavender scents already, so I'm not sure if its FBW.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="1947758"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=1947758#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1947549" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1947549" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263755.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Perris-Monte-Carlo/Oud-Imperial-Extrait-37829.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.37829.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Imperial Extrait"title="Oud Imperial Extrait"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1947549ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1947549" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755">The Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-09">10/09/23 01:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was disappointed in Myrrhe 55 when it came out, but Le Labo came correct with this release. This one really surprised me because it smells like an Italian Colonia but with stellar performance. I'd even venture to say that if you don't like Italian style colognes you will hate this fragrance. This smells like something Acqua Di Parma would release, but more concentrated. It opens with a BRIGHT, heavenly blast of citruses, followed quickly by neroli. The lavender doesn't surface right away and when it does, it's not powerful, but soapy clean. They didn't use a heavy hand with the lavender here. The drydown smells like a like a high quality soap along and lines of Colonia Essenza but it lasts forever. I washed my hands and took a shower and I can still smell it almost 10 hours later. I picture guy on Lake Como wearing khaki shorts, and a white dress shirt. Very soapy and clean, and perfect for the heat.I like it strongly, but I already have a dozen or so soapy fragrances, so I won't be purchasing unless I come across a nice deal.<br />
<br />
Scent 9/10<br />
Performance 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="1947549"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=1947549#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1946898" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
