padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1941485" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="teh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371398"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1371398.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="teh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Pur-Oud-66436.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66436.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pur Oud"title="Pur Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1941485ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1941485" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371398">teh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-01">10/01/23 00:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>bro be launching 2 perfumes in a year and both are cashgrabs.. this smells like some random Zara men perfumes - cheap and generic, slapped over the typical lelabo musk (aka Another 13) not sure why it gets such a high rating lol?! well I guess Le labo we know has gone </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="1941485"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=1941485#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1939266" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1939266" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Liamsardea"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/802447"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.802447.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Liamsardea" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Caron/Yatagan-4024.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4024.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yatagan"title="Yatagan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1939266ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1939266" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/802447">Liamsardea</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-28">09/28/23 05:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Le Labo says Lavande, I say Neroli! The lavender is present albeit dominated by an orange blossom note - whether you find this distracting or not will be up to your tolerance levels, but I personally bemoan Le Labos nominal trickery where what you read is not what you get. It feels disingenuous to me. Lavande blankets its floral-lavender tones in creamy white musk. It is not a fougere, but a floral.<br />
<br />
Save your money: buy Jersey, Boy, Pour Un Homme, 1725, Eau Noire, Masculin Pluriel, Serges lavender trio (Encens et Lavande, Fourreau Noir, Gris Clair) or seek the now discontinued and very beautiful Brin de Reglisse. <br />
<br />
Sincerely, a lavender lover.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="1939266"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=1939266#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2052227" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2052227" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zig von Katz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2001841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2001841.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zig von Katz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2052227ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2052227" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2001841">Zig von Katz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-04">02/04/24 15:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I used to clean hotel rooms for a living when I was in my 20s, and this very much takes me back to that. An opening of floor cleaner with a musky base note. I strongly dislike this because of the association with low wages for back-breaking work.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2052227"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2052227#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2188298" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2188298" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="angienkj"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1880002"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1880002.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="angienkj" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Cedrat-37-Berlin-68788.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68788.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cedrat 37 Berlin"title="Cedrat 37 Berlin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2188298ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2188298" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1880002">angienkj</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-14">06/14/24 13:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like my 10 lavender soap, $1 lavender room spray, $2 lavender floor cleaner, and my $1 toilet bowl cleaner. The only difference is the price. When I was wearing this, my husband thought I sprayed myself with our room spray; he was in total shock. Then I told him, "I am wearing Le Labo perfume." He was in even greater shock.<br />
The scent is good but smells cheap and artificial; it is not worth the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="2188298"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=2188298#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1930260" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1930260" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="haywirelibran"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1328503"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="haywirelibran" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Gaiac-10-Tokyo-6335.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6335.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gaiac 10 Tokyo"title="Gaiac 10 Tokyo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1930260ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1930260" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1328503">haywirelibran</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-17">09/17/23 10:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've actually smelled this at Le Labo store in France, because they had just prepared it and it wasn't on the shelf, but since I asked about it, they let me smell it and test it on my skin. It was nice, but all I could think of was Raid Anti-Moth capsules, so in a way it smelled generic and dare I say cheap.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84249"comment_id="1930260"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lavande-31-84249.html?ccid=1930260#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="84249" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

        <div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">

        <a href="/perfume/Byredo/Eyes-Closed-76339.html#cc2354693"><span class="link-span"></span>
            <span class="brand">Byredo</span><br>            <span class="ztworowseclipse">Eyes Closed</span>
        </a>
        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="the peak of sensuality. it is not mass appealing at all, the overly musky cinnamon usually scares people away instantly, but then it transforms into this beautiful amalgamation of sweet &amp; spiciness. 8.5/10 , signature scent worthy.">by
            <em>CHESTDAYBABY</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/s.1658356.jpg"
                                                     style="width: 2em; height: 2em; border-radius: 1em"></span>
    </div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">
        <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/m.50414.jpg" style="width: 60px; height: 64px; margin-right: 0.5em; flex-shrink: 0"/>
        <a href="/perfume/Bottega-Veneta/Parco-Palladiano-VIII-Neroli-50414.html#cc2354692"><span class="link-span"></span>
            <span class="brand">Bottega Veneta</span><br>            <span class="ztworowseclipse">Parco Palladiano VIII: Neroli</span>
        </a>
        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="Very reminiscent of moroccan orange blossom water. Very floral take on neroli, but still unisex I&#039;d say, and as a man I usually have trouble with feminine leaning scents. This is a unique, neroli a must try for neroli lovers, but still an acquired taste.">by
            <em>PLK</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/s.1456290.jpg"
                                                     style="width: 2em; height: 2em; border-radius: 1em"></span>
    </div>

            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">24.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Creed/Aventus-9828.html" class="en2inter">Aventus Creed</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        </div>

    <script>

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgH0e5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });

</script>
